name: claude-dev-radar
description: AI-powered development tools: R.A.D.A.R. repository analysis + C.I.D.E.R. atomic issues system for Claude Code

scripts.dev: npm link && echo 'Development mode ready! Use: claude-radar, claude-cider, claude-setup'
scripts.test: npm run test:radar && npm run test:cider
scripts.test:radar: echo 'Testing RADAR commands...' && claude-radar --help && echo 'RADAR help OK ✅'
scripts.test:cider: echo 'Testing CIDER commands...' && claude-cider --help && echo 'CIDER help OK ✅'
scripts.test:full: echo 'Running full integration test...' && CLAUDE_RADAR_DEBUG=true claude-radar discover . && echo 'Integration test completed ✅'

author: AI Developer Tools
